Cheeto Puff is. i mean seriously, you donâ€™t get better than orange skin. anyway, i saw this app and i screamed as loud as i could in a public area, â€œTRUMP IS SO AMAZING HE MADE A MOBILE APP FOR HIMSELF!!! SO HUMBLE!!! I MUST DOWNLOAD THIS IMMEDIATELY!!!â€ then everyone around me started clapping and cheering and i was given the key to the city. alas, that is the only good thing that came of this app. this is actually a horrible app. as soon as i logged in i was asked very personal questions, and iâ€™ve seen some other reviews about this. i was asked my name, what i was wearing, they asked for pictures of me from the side and front, but i thought â€œitâ€™s okay, itâ€™s trump!! why would he EVER do anything bad or rude or sketchy or dumb??â€ anyway, it started messing with my life after this. i got ad after ad about trump, which would not have been a problem except it was covering my entire screen to the point in which i couldnâ€™t even use my phone, and i had to buy a brand new phone without any of my old pictures, apps or anything so that the app wouldnâ€™t download onto my new phone. but then i realized it was probably some stupid blue haired liberal democrat person who had messed with the app, because trump would NEVER do anything like this. heâ€™s too smart to not find anything wrong with the app. heâ€™s never done ANYTHING wrong and handles everything PERFECTLY. so i downloaded it a second time and now all my furniture sings â€œtrump 2020â€ which again would be fine except i havenâ€™t slept in five weeks and i keep seeing things. anyway, TRUMP 2020 (i hope you guys know this is a joke iâ€™m PRETTY convincing when it comes to pretending to be a trump supporter. i promise i hate him.)
